#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define in freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
#define esp 1e-10
#define lson l, m, rt<<1
#define rson m+1, r, rt<<1|1

using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
typedef map<LL, int> MPS;
int main(){
    
    int T;
    for(int t = scanf("%d", &T); t <= T; t++){
        LL a, b, sum;
        cin >> a >> b >> sum;
        LL n = sum*2/(a+b);
        LL d = (b-a)/(n-5);
        LL fi = a-d*2;
        cout << n << endl;
        for(int i = 0;i < n; i++, fi += d)
            printf("%lld%c", fi, i == n-1 ? '\n' : ' ');

    }
    return 0;
}
